      • Main

        public Main()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        This method groups all the methods needed to make the program work. pre: All the preconditions for the others methods altogether. post: It saves the results of all the methods to show them in the Main.

      • askForGeneralAmount

        public int askForGeneralAmount()
        This method saves the total amount of materials for the construction. pre: The number has to be an integer (bigger than 0). post: The total amount of materials will be saved.

      • askForProductName

        public java.lang.String[] askForProductName(int generalAmount)
        This method saves the names of each product. pre: The user has to enter the names in order of utility, first those for black work, then for white work, and then for paint. post: The names have been saved in an array of strings.
        Parameters:
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount != null && generalAmount > 0.

      • askForProductAmount

        public int[] askForProductAmount(int generalAmount)
        This method saves the individual quantity of each product pre: The user has to enter integers numbers. post: The individual quantities have been saved in an array of integers.
        Parameters:
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount != null && generalAmount > 0.

      • utilization

        public java.lang.String[] utilization(int generalAmount)
        This method saves the utilization of each product. pre: The user has to enter strings. First those for black work, then for white work, and then for paint. post: The individual utilities have been saved in an array of strings.
        Parameters:
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount != null && generalAmount > 0.

      • priceForEachPlace

        public int[] priceForEachPlace(int generalAmount,
                               java.lang.String placeName)
        This method saves the price of each product in the diferents stores. pre: The user has to enter integers. First those for HomeCenter, then for Ferreteria del Centro, and then for Ferreteria del barrio. pre: Don´t repeat the same price for an item in diferents stores. post: The individual prices will be saved in an array of integers.
        Parameters:
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount != null && generalAmount > 0.
        placeName - Name of the store. They are called in the Main.

      • delivery

        public java.lang.String delivery()
        This method saves the location of the user. pre: The user has to enter a string. It could be norte, sur or centro. post: The location have been saved in an string.

      • bestPlace

        public void bestPlace(int[] homecenterPrices,
                      int[] centerstorePrices,
                      int[] neighborhoodPrices,
                      java.lang.String[] name,
                      int generalAmount,
                      int[] eachAmount)
        This method show the best place to buy each item and how much it will cost in total if the user bought it that way. pre: The arrays where the prices are saved have to be inicializated. post: It will show the best place to buy each material and the price there (taking into account the quantity), then the total price.
        Parameters:
        homecenterPrices - Price of each material in HomeCenter. homecenterPrices > 0 && homecenterPrices != null.
        centerstorePrices - Price of each material in the Center store. centerstorePrices > 0 && centerstorePrices != null.
        neighborhoodPrices - Price of each material in the Neighborhood store. neighborhoodPrices > 0 && neighborhoodPrices != null.
        name - Name of each material. name != "" && name != null.
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount > 0 && generalAmount != null.
        eachAmount - Quantity of each item. eachAmount > 0 && eachAmount != null.

      • utilizationsGroups

        public void utilizationsGroups(java.lang.String[] work,
                               java.lang.String[] name,
                               int generalAmount)
        This method separate the materials according to the utilization. pre: All the materials have to have their utilization in the right order. post: It will print the name of the materials for each group of utilizations.
        Parameters:
        work - Utilization of each material. work != null && work != "".
        name - Name of each material. name != "" && name != null.
        generalAmount - Total amount of materials for the construction. generalAmount > 0 && generalAmount != null.
